alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 7:22PM CDT until June 05 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Kansas, including the following counties, Osborne and Rooks. * WHEN...Until midnight CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 720 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicates between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Spring Creek, Jim Creek, Kill Creek, Paradise Creek, Wild Horse Creek, Coon Creek, Boxelder Creek, Wolf Creek, Eagle Creek, Lost Creek, Lawrence Creek, Joy Creek, Twin Creek, Covert Creek, Douglas Creek, Elm Creek, Crooked Creek, Lucky Creek, Sand Creek, East Kill Creek and Medicine Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Plainville, Stockton, Natoma, Palco, Woodston, Damar, Alton, Zurich and Codell. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
